title: Colby Minifie on ‘The Boys’ Season 3, Plus Why You Should Be Watching ‘Irma Vep’
description:
Andy talks about ‘The Old Man’ getting renewed for a second season, and why you should give the new HBO show ‘Irma Vep’ a chance (1:00). Then, he's joined by actress Colby Minifie to talk about her work as a stage actress (16:47) and how it prepared her for ‘The Boys’ (36:51).

Host: Andy Greenwald
Guest: Colby Minifie
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Check out the ‘Baranksi BBQ '22’ Playlist here.
Donate to the National Network of Abortion Funds here.
